flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
The 5 different sections are:

  • frame
  • top and bottom (with casters)
  • pegboard doors
  • inside shelving
  • sides
  • optional: fold-out side tables

Each section can be made separately, then assembled together at the end.

It is recommended that you build the frame, top/bottom surfaces, or pegboard doors as the first 3 modules (in whichever chronology). These 3 sections should be assembled before the sides, inside shelves, or fold-out side tables can be built and attached.

guide.summary: This mobile tool cart is made up of 5 modular sections. These modules -- and thus, the cart -- can be built over the course of one weekend or split into numerous periods, depending your time and equipment availability.
